projects.p1: This is a large-scale project of social significance. The cultural and entertainment cluster in Tashkent is one of the city's new attractions.
projects.p2: A multifunctional residential complex created for the convenience of Uzbekistan's residents.
projects.p3: Fonon – a jewelry manufacturing plant built in Uzbekistan in 2020 based on Italian factories. Fonon is the only major company in Central Asia that produces jewelry from precious metals in European and Eastern styles.

projects.p5: An international kindergarten and school located in the Tashkent City International Business Center.

news.title1: Who is a Construction Project Manager?
news.desc1: Discover Invest employs several construction project managers. These specialists are responsible for successfully implementing the construction project – from planning and document approval to completion and, in some cases, post-project support.
news.desc2: The sophisticated interior design of the halls creates a comfortable atmosphere even before entering the apartment, and the intuitive navigation system helps you easily reach the desired floor or area.
news.desc3: The transportation infrastructure allows easy access to any part of the city – simply choose the right route.
news.title4: We continue to introduce you to the multifunctional projects of Discover Invest.
news.desc4: We continue to introduce you to the multifunctional projects of 'ATAEV BAHODIR BUILD'. One of them is the 'Yangi Choshtepa' residential complex, located in the Yangihayat district of Tashkent. The total construction area is 12 hectares, and so far, 29 residential buildings have been constructed.

about.h2: PROHVAC Heating and Air Conditioning Installation Service
about.p: We don’t just install heating and cooling systems – we ensure comfort and efficiency. By designing and installing climate systems based on modern technologies, we improve the quality of life. Energy efficiency and environmental safety are our top priorities, and we offer reliable and innovative solutions for our clients.
